item.description:
This Brunch is specifically for our Diamond Members... So if you fit the criteria for Diamond status (Please Look at "About" page on the groups status bar to understand your status)

You loyal Madams get to sign up for our event this month at Mexican/ American in Astoria, which will feature a a discounted prefix  brunch menu for $18, with endless free Margaritas  games, and much more! 
We just want to show you ladies that we appreciate you for being consistant, loyal and reliable members. So if you know for sure you can make it this Saturday please sign up!

All for you darling! Check it out! 

http://www.mojaveny.com/

Thanks Lovelies!!

Lisa 
MWN Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: We will have the large table! Call my cell: 413-627-3484
item.why: We are celebrating our Diamonds Brunch at our new location in Astoria, called Mojave it is the sis rest. to Agave in the city, but this is for the Queens Madams. If you would prefer to come to the brunch in the city, join us in April at Agave!
item.name: “Le Madame Brunch,” at tMojave-ASTORIA For The Diamond Status Madame--QUEENS!!
